alert.note: Alert for Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Nelson; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:14PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Grand Forks, northeastern Nelson and Walsh Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 314 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pisek, or 14 miles west of Grafton, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grafton, Park River, Minto, Gilby, Fordville, Petersburg and Forest River. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Nelson; Western Walsh County
